        public ReasonedException.Builder with​(java.lang.String name,

        Returns:

      • with

        Sets a pair of enum value and value for an error situation parameter.

      • by

        public ReasonedException by​(java.lang.Enum<?> reason)
        Builds a ReasonedException instance. If CreationHandler objects are registered with ReasonedExceptionConfiguration, these handlers are notified that a ReasonedException is created with this method.
        Parameters:
        reason - A reason of this exception.
        Returns:
        A new ReasonedException object.

      • by

        public ReasonedException by​(java.lang.Enum<?> reason,
                            java.lang.Throwable cause)
        Builds a ReasonedException instance with a cause exception. If CreationHandler objects are registered with ReasonedExceptionConfiguration, these handlers are notified that a ReasonedException is created with this method.
        Parameters:
        reason - A reason of this exception.
        cause - A cause exception.
        Returns:
        A new ReasonedException object.
